conclusion: Analyze motion using the v-t graph to determine when particles A and B meet.
The graph shows the velocity of particles A and B over time.
The area under the v-t graph represents the displacement of each particle.
Calculate displacement of particle A from t=0 to t=t0 as v0 t0.
Calculate displacement of particle A from t=t0 to t=2t0 as v0 t0.
Total displacement of A from t=0 to t=2t0 is 2v0 t0.
Calculate displacement of particle B from t=0 to t=2t0 as v0 t0.
Calculate displacement of particle B from t=2t0 to t=3t0 as v0 t0.
Total displacement of B from t=0 to t=3t0 is 2v0 t0.
Particles A and B have the same total displacement at t=3t0.
Particles A and B meet at t=3t0.
